subject: Access to Private
msgSnippet: Can anyone point me to some documentation on accessing private methods and attributes within a class for testing purposes? Does Junit have any classes that
messageBody:
Can anyone point me to some documentation on accessing private methods and
attributes within a class for testing purposes? Does Junit have any classes that
assist you in doing this?

Thanx,
--
Michael

* "The god you make is the god you must defend..."
* "...the God that made you needs no defense."
*
* Michael Tennes
